module.name: guiUpdater
module.description: Module responsible for polling the OPC for various content (objects, skeletons, etc.) and updating icubGui based on this.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: The purpose of this module is to retrieve information from the online database implemented by the objectsPropertiesCollector module (OPC) and format/transmit this information to the gui implemented by iCubGui (icub repo).

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
Name of the OPC to connect to
Agents skeletons will be displayed if available.

input.description: Response port. Supported commands: - help - quit - reset (Resets the iCubGUI)
